channel.title: Hedwig Klinge on Ric - An unknown artist
channel.description: Recent content in Hedwig Klinge on Ric - An unknown artist

item.title: Hedwig Klinge in the Fine Art Collection Schmelzle
item.description:
Since the identity of Fritz Neumann has been clarified and the extracts from the civil registers are known, we know about his wife Hedwig Klinge. Since the beginning of the year, some examples of her work can be found in this blog.

Now Peter Schmelzle has come forward. Since 2018, he has been searching for the person behind the signature ‘Klinge’. He also asked his readers to send in examples of corresponding graphics and thus created a small collection of examples of graphics by Hedwig Klinge. He recently became aware of the contribution with the etching of a magnolia and was thus able to clarify the identity.

item.title: A pseudonym of Hede Klinge-Neumann in the "Catalog of Copyright Entries"
item.description:
As Mark Strong of Meibohm Fine Arts pointed out, there is also a Pseudonym of Hede Klinge-Neumann in the “Catalog of Copyright Entries” 1939, Vol 34 No 1-4. A the name “Dienhoff” is noted to be a pseudonym of H. Neumann-Klinge.

More about this catalogue can be found in the corresponding article on Fritz Neumann . Other entries mentioning here are in a seperate post .

item.title: Hedwig Klinge Small child in bed
item.description:
Short description: An etching of a small child in bed by Hedwig Klinge, wife of Fritz Neumann.

Notes: Found on Kleinanzeigen.

item.title: Hedwig Klinge Children on a meadow
item.description:
Short description: A print of Children on a meadow by Hedwig Klinge, wife of Fritz Neumann, again wrongly attributed.

Notes: Found on Kleinanzeigen.

item.title: Hedwig Klinge Small children in bed
item.description:
Short description: A print of small children in bed by Hedwig Klinge, wife of Fritz Neumann.

item.title: Hedwig Klinge Magnolias
item.description:
Short description: A etching of Magnolias by Hedwig Klinge, wife of Fritz Neumann.

Notes: Thanks to Mark Strong of Meibohm Fine Arts for providing the image. Note, that the JCB blind embossing is clearly visible.

Images by Mark Strong of Meibohm Fine Arts .

item.title: Hedwig Klinge Girl and dog
item.description:
Short description: A etching of a small girl and a dog by Hedwig Klinge, wife of Fritz Neumann.

Notes: This is a Aprils fools day post, since the image itself is attributed to Max Klinger , see last photo. It was also offered on the web a a work by Max Klinger.

item.title: Hede Klinge-Neumann in the "Catalog of Copyright Entries"
item.description: As it is known from the newspaper article that Fritz Neumann’s wife also worked as an artist, here are some references from the catalogue of copyright entries. More about this catalogue can be found in the corresponding article on Fritz Neumann .
